data.Name: nascar aloe
data.Bio: Enigmatic North Carolina native Nascar Aloe has placed himself firmly at the forefront of the underground rap scene with his unique and captivating blend of punk energy, raw 808s and terrifying visuals. Originally from Lexington, North Carolina, Nascar began cultivating a die-hard fan base in 2018 by self-releasing music on SoundCloud and consistently playing shows in LAâ€™s underground circuit. Read more on Last.fm
